data.name: applicationExit
data.value: Closing the application

data.name: applicationExitQuestion
data.value:
You are about to leave the application.
Do you really want to exit?

data.name: authenticationFailed
data.value: Authentification failed

data.name: authenticationNeeded
data.value: Waiting for authentication with your Gmail account...

data.name: authenticationWithGmailRefused
data.value:
You refused the application accesses your Gmail account. This step is required and will be asked again the next time.
The application will now quit.

data.name: error
data.value: Error

data.name: firstLoad
data.value: Gmail notifier now runs in background on your computer. In a few seconds you will be prompted to sign in to your Gmail account to allow the application to access your inbox.

data.name: gmailDisconnect
data.value: Disconnecting your Gmail account

data.name: gmailDisconnectQuestion
data.value:
You are about to disconnect your Gmail account from the applivation: you will no longer receive notifications from the account {account_name} and you will be prompted to log in next time.
Do you really want to disconnect your Gmail account and restart the application now?

data.name: helpAskonExit
data.value: Asks a question before completely leaving the app

data.name: helpAttemptToReconnectNotification
data.value: Displays a notification when the application tries to reconnect to the network

data.name: helpAudioNotification
data.value: Plays a sound when displaying a notification

data.name: helpCheckForUpdate
data.value: Check availability of updates immediately

data.name: helpEmailAddress
data.value: Gmail account currently logged in to the application

data.name: helpGmailDisconnect
data.value: Disconnect the Gmail account and restarts the application to request a new authentication

data.name: helpLanguage
data.value: Language of the interface

data.name: helpMessageNotification
data.value: Displays a notification when receiving new messages

data.name: helpNotificationBehavior
data.value: Action performed when clicking on a notification

data.name: helpNumericDelay
data.value: Timing delay of the inbox

data.name: helpPrivacyNotificationAll
data.value: Displays a notification containing no information about the message

data.name: helpPrivacyNotificationNone
data.value: Displays the name of the sender and the message content

data.name: helpPrivacyNotificationShort
data.value: Displays the name of the sender and the subject line

data.name: helpRunAtWindowsStartup
data.value: Launch the application on Windows startup

data.name: helpSpamNotification
data.value: Displays a notification when receiving a junk message

data.name: helpStatistics
data.value: Usage statistics of your inbox

data.name: helpStepDelay
data.value: Time scale for the inbox synchronization

data.name: helpTokenDelivery
data.value: Latest update of the authentication token delivery

data.name: helpUpdateControl
data.value: Last check date of updates

data.name: helpUpdateDownload
data.value: When updates are available, the application downloads them and launches the installation automatically

data.name: helpUpdatePeriod
data.value: Update check period

data.name: helpUpdateQuiet
data.value: When updates are being installed, the application installs them silently in the background

data.name: helpUpdateService
data.value: Enables the automatic update check service

data.name: latestVersion
data.value: You have the latest version of the application.

data.name: markAsRead
data.value: Mark as read

data.name: markAsReadError
data.value: Error with the "Mark as read" operation

data.name: markAsReadErrorOccured
data.value: An error occurred during the "Mark Read" operation:

data.name: multipleInstances
data.value: Multiple instances

data.name: mutexError
data.value:
The "Gmail notifier" application is already running: you can not run multiple instances of the application on the same computer.
This option is not enabled on this type of application.

data.name: newUnreadMessage
data.value: Double-click the icon to access your inbox.

data.name: newUnreadSpam
data.value: Double-click the icon to access your inbox. Until you have not checked the spam folder, your inbox will not be synchronized and you will not be notified of new messages.

data.name: newVersion
data.value:
A newer version of the application is available on Github: Gmail Notifier {version}.
Do you want to download it now?

data.name: noMessage
data.value: No new message

data.value: Attempting to reconnect...

data.name: reconnectFailed
data.value: Reconnection failed

data.name: sync
data.value: Syncing...

data.name: syncError
data.value: Error when syncing

data.name: syncErrorOccured
data.value: An error occurred during the synchronization of the inbox:
